#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{int n,i,a,b,k,ans;
int arr1[100002]={0},arr2[100002]={0};
cin>>n;

k=0;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{cin>>a>>b;
if(a!=b)
{arr1[a]++;
arr2[b]++;}
else
    arr1[a]++;


}
ans=100000000;
for(i=0;i<=100000;i++)
{
    if(arr1[i]+arr2[i]<(n+1)/2)
        continue;
    ans=min(ans,max(0,(n+1)/2-arr1[i]));
}
  if(ans>=100000000)
    cout<<"Impossible"<<endl;
    else
        cout<<ans<<endl;

    return 0;}
